channel.title: Server goin online after i fix these Easy things?
channel.description:
1. This first one just a question really what dedi should i get for easyrsc source don't flame please its source i chose i like it yes its easy blahh..whatever but just needed honest opinions on a good dedi for this source.
2. Yes, this is easy I'm sure i feel stupid for asking cuz I've tryed just won't work the z00mOut and z00m in need help with that.
[s]3. ::say I want players to be able to read what people have said globaly under quest tab at bottom of screen I've read post on it didn't quite seem to catch on i suppose.[/s]
4. How to make it where only 1 account can be logged in at a time? this would be nice I haven't found anything on it so if anyone knows thanks
5. MakeOverMage won't work in easyrsc isn't really that important to me I'd have fun on server without it but would be nice feature.
6. FOG! would be nice to disapear I've read topics on it followed them didn't seem to help
Thank you, :P

item.description:
@skarletdeath wrote:

i don’t know lol its so stupid I opened a fresh copy of easyrsc copy files and pasted to fresh souce and works…so kill/death thing is good now guess ill just have to work with fresh copy.

item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“KO9, post:18, topic:330789”]Why on earth would you want to run a server on an iPhone…

Osry guise, server is just going down for a minute while I ring my mum.[/quote]
rofl or… “hold up guys, i need to text my friend back”, or “i need to check google maps, secs!”.

item.title: Server goin online after i fix these Easy things?
item.dc:creator: @skarletdeath skarletdeath
item.description:
@skarletdeath wrote:

I could prolly run off my computer at home I have 100.0 mpbs and memory RAM: 3.00 GB but problem with that is I’ve sent out some clients to friends and in info it shows my computers i.p address someone could fuck me up if they wanted to with that info also if i got a dedi would protect aginst ddos and would give me a 24-7 up server with a dedi ip address.

Read full topic

item.title: Server goin online after i fix these Easy things?
item.dc:creator: @darscape darscape
item.description:
@darscape wrote:

You can install linux on a jailbroken itouch/iphone and install a limited JRE on it although JDK doesn’t work from what I can remember.

I did it with my itouch (1st gen) but the rs2 server didn’t launch. 3rd gen iphone/itouch now have a great deal more RAM though.

Read full topic

darscape:

I want to host it off my windows mobile 6.5 phone

item.title: Server goin online after i fix these Easy things?
item.dc:creator: @roflcopterofl roflcopterofl
item.description:
@roflcopterofl wrote:

sigh it’s spoon feeding time everyone.

the questions with the fog and zoom can easily be found by searching “fog of war” on the searchbar on the top right. The zoom can be found by searching “zoom” or just go to the first search result of “fog” and you’ll see both.

Old Rsc Player:

Run it off a itouch. It works

how lol? The only way you could do that would be to use VNC. I don’t think you could do it with a jailbreak by putting the files on it.

Read full topic

like lets pk said theres alotta what you said on the search. also it’s mostly all copy and paste, if u cant even do that then im afraid u will not last long and no point in getting a dedi. run it off your pc invite a couple friends to play on it till u get the hang of it no point in getting a dedi if your just begining
